page.title: 01INTRODUCTORY PAGE 1
page.content:
This is a rural area lying on the flood plain of the{River Thames}and surrounded by the urban development of {Slough, Windsor and Maidenhead.
Within the square are the historic and picturesque villages of{Dorney, {Boveney, Eton Wick and Clewer.}The first three villages have common land rights which protect the area from urban development.
{The Thames}meanders through water meadows, past fields of grain, oil seed rape, and grazing cattle. During the tourist season the river is alive with holidaymakers.
Because of the flat nature of the area a wide panorama can be seen on all sides. To the South East,{Windsor {Castle}overlooks the scene.
